events.message: I received my order yesterday but unfortunately it was the wrong item. I want to return it and get a refund as soon as possible.
The customer's request is related to a refund due to receiving the wrong item. Cluster assigned as Refund.
A customer service agent has been assigned to handle the refund request for the incorrect item received.
Hello! I'm sorry to hear you received the wrong item. I'll assist you with the return and refund process.
Could you please provide your order number and photos of the item you received so we can proceed with your return?
Sure, my order number is 4527893. I have attached photos showing the item I received which is not what I ordered.
Thank you for the details. We will initiate the return authorization immediately and issue a full refund once the item is received back.
That sounds good, thank you for your prompt help. I will send the item back today.
We have received your returned item and processed your refund. Please allow 3-5 business days for the amount to appear on your account.
Just checking in to confirm that you received your refund and everything is satisfactory. Please let us know if you need further assistance.
We are closing your refund case as resolved. Thank you for your patience and we hope to serve you better next time.
